text: 12.24 Jop 38.41, Sng 147.9, Luk 12.7 Nɨb nepɨm, yawl okok tap yɨŋ ma yɨbal, tap ñɨŋeb okok ma tɨk dap nan gɨpal agak. Tap mɨdup pɨpag dap nan gɨnɨgel kal kɨli ogɨnap ma mɨdeb agak. God nep nɨm, kɨlop tap ñɨl kod mɨdek, tap ñɨbal agak. Ne yawl tap yokɨp ak anɨgɨl gup, nɨbi pen binɨb yɨbɨl ak, taynen chɨnop ma kod yenɨgab agɨl gos kuŋay nepɨm agak?
